caption.title: Forest plot of the frequency of laboratory confirmed CDV in biological samples from domestic dogs.
caption.p: Fig 3A shows the analysis of the subgroups of molecular, antibody and antigen surveys. Fig 3B shows the subgroup regarding the clinical signs of dogs (molecular surveys). The length of the line indicates the 95% confidence interval for each study, and the diamonds represent the pooled estimate. ID = identification of study; ES = effect size; Events = CDV POS.
